acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should be able to manufacture any type of Lists
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldBeAbleToManufactureAnyTypeOfCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke Podam for a Generic Pojo specifying the concrete types
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.String
